document_data.name: The Faithful Mamluk Society
document_data.mainbody: The '''Faithful Mamluk Society''', also known as the '''Faithful''', was a military organization in [[Zakhara]].{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|21}}
document_data.Activities: The Faithful represented one of the more powerful mamluk societies in [[Qudra]]. In addition to their duties in Qudra, they loyally served the [[Khalil al-Assad al-Zahir|Grand Caliph]] in golden [[Huzuz]].
document_data.Organization: The Faithful were led by General [[Adun Abd al-Amin]].
document_data.Base of Operations: Most of the [[mamluk]]s of the Faithful lived and worked in Qudra, but a strong presence was maintained in Huzuz as well.
